definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: It is the most common type of extranodal low-grade B cell lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 它是結外低度惡性B細胞淋巴瘤中最常見的一型。

sentences.english: Nodal NK-cell lymphoma are quite rare.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴結中，NK細胞淋巴瘤很少。

sentences.english: Dysregulation of the pathway involves in T lymphoblastic leukemia and other diseases.
sentences.chinese: 該通路的失調將導致T細胞淋巴瘤等疾病的發生。

sentences.english: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) is a highly heterogeneous disease.
sentences.chinese: 瀰漫大B細胞淋巴瘤是一種高度異質性疾病。

sentences.english: Lymphoma is cancer that starts in the lymphatic system.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴瘤是起始於淋巴系統的癌症。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss CT features of ileocecum lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析回盲部惡性淋巴瘤的CT表現。

sentences.english: Objective Nasal cavity and sinuses is a usual site of extranodal lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的鼻腔是結外常發生淋巴瘤的部位之一。

sentences.english: Xu Shuyuan, Professor, Supervisor of master's students. Specializes in gynecological tumors and leucoma, and engaged in clinicopathologic and immunopathologic studies.
sentences.chinese: 主攻婦科腫瘤和淋巴瘤的臨牀病理和免疫病理學研究。

sentences.english: The most common malignancy was malignant lymphoma and Kaposi sarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的惡性腫瘤爲卡波西氏肉瘤及惡性淋巴瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusion True histiocytic lymphoma is a rare subset of NHL.
sentences.chinese: 結論真性組織細胞型淋巴瘤罕見。

sentences.english: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma is the most common.
sentences.chinese: 組織學類型主要爲瀰漫大B細胞淋巴瘤。

sentences.english: The organization raises money for leukemia and lymphoma research.
sentences.chinese: 那組織爲白血病和淋巴瘤研究籌集資金。

sentences.english: Rates of leukemia and non-Hodgkin lymphoma increased in both men and women.
sentences.chinese: 在男女雙方里加重的白血病和非霍奇金淋巴瘤的機率。

sentences.english: Most of histological types were diffuse B-cell lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 病理類型主要爲瀰漫性大B細胞性淋巴瘤。

sentences.english: The pathologic diagnosis was primary cutaneous anaplastic large cell lymphoma.
sentences.chinese: 診斷爲原發性皮膚間變性大細胞淋巴瘤。

sentences.english: Lymphoma can also result in either regional or generalized lymphadenopathy.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴瘤可導致局部或全身淋巴結病。

pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 gu3 sui3 liu2

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
